comments:
When I use Help/About/Plug-in Details, I get a NullPointerException in the 
Error Log. This is with the M9 Eclipse build 2004040713337.

There are actually three exceptions in the Error Log. All three stack traces 
appear in the attachment to this bug. The most interesting one appears to be 
this one:

java.lang.NullPointerException

Created an attachment (id=9542)
Exported Error Log containing two entries

Attached the log. It has two entries, not three as I said in the first comment.
Changed to UI component because clearly it's a UI problem, not core.

This should have been fixed as part of the last change to the AboutDialog; 
bug#54548 (which was submitted just after the apr 07 build).
